name: Red Spiders
description:
RedSpiders
A Game for the XKCD GameJam 2017

Kill the spiders.
Don't die.
Use WASD or Arrow keys to move from building to building.
When a spider raches a roof, it will settle down for a short time - it is then that it is vulnerable.
Jump on it, and it will die.
Miss-time your jump, and it will bite you. You will still kill it, but will suffer a health loss.

Known issues:
You can jump off screen. Keep track - and jump back on.
No sound - play some music on your phone (bug in sound engine I couldn't work around in time)
No end of game - when your health gets to 0, refresh.
No animation. In the pipeline - just ran out of time.

PooperPig (from the planet Krapton)
19th November 2017
